column2: What is the name of the flashing symbol on the computer screen that shows where the information you enter will appear?
What is the name for any computer program that performs a specific task separate from the computer operating system that runs programs?
What is the area inside the computer that allows the computer to store and/or act on information coded in binary code?
What is the mechanism that holds, spins, and reads the information on a disk?
What is an information storage unit that makes use of digitally coded signals on a coated plastic disk?
What is the primary input device used to enter information and instructions into the computer?
What is the hand-held device used as a pointing and/or drawing instrument?
What is the front part of a monitor where information is displayed?
What is a reusable information storage device made of a floppy piece of plastic inside a hard plastic protector?
What is the permanently installed mechanism inside the computer that stores all data that is put into the computer, even after the computer is turned off?
What type of software is used for the creation of letters, papers, and other documents?
What is any piece of computer hardware that displays output after the computer has processed the data or information that has been input?
What is a large collection of data stored in a computer? You might use this type of program to keep a record of all the friends in your address book.
What is a single binary digit, 0 or 1? It is the smallest unit of data that a computer can process.
What means to capture, store, update, and retrieve data and information? A computer is this type of machine.
What do we call a computer program that organizes data in rows and columns of cells?
What are the numbers made up of 0's and 1's? They are used in computers to represent information.
What is the basic software that a computer needs to interpret input from input devices, run programs, and read from or write to hard drives and disks?
What is a tool that finds Web pages in online databases based on terms and criteria specified by the user?
What is a set of eight binary digits (bits that are either 0 or 1) that represent a letter, number, or symbol? (01000011)
What is part of a database that holds only one type of information?
What is another name for the microprocessor, the main processing unit of the computer?
What do we call a collection of two or more computers that are located within a limited distance of each other and that are connected to each other directly or indirectly?
What is part of a database that holds all of the information about one item or subject?
What is a networked computer that is shared by multiple users?
What do we call anything created with a software program that is stored in a computer?
What word means to copy or send a file from a local computer to another computer on the Internet?
What is the personal computer operating system that organizes files within a computer and uses a graphic desktop environment?
What is the temporary storage memory chips that form the computer's primary work space? The contents are lost if power is disrupted.
What is the term for a computer program, usually produced and used maliciously, that can destroy or damage computer information?
